text: you wake up on a cold stone floor in a darkly lit room. you hear strange noises coming from outside the room you're in. after a while the noises die down and you slowly get up and prepare to face whatever is out there.

the voices in your head would not relent until you fled the village one night and found yourself in the front of an ancient tomb that was forbidden to enter. the next moments are hazy, but you wake up in a room with stone walls, presumably inside the tomb. you feel a sense of evil in the air and feel desperate to find a way out.
visited: yep, it's the room you started in alright. yessireebob.
you brace yourself for anything, but then realize it's the room you started in. nothing to see here.
